dcterms:creator: A. K. McCallum
K. Nigam
J. Rennie
K. Seymore
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network where nodes denote publications and are connected if cited by another. The node attribute is described by a sparse bag of word feature vectors.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: C. L. Giles
K. D. Bollacker
S. Lawrence
dcterms:description: Citeseer is a citation network where nodes denote publications and are connected if cited by another. The node attribute is described by a sparse bag of word feature vectors.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: C. Yang
Z. Liu
D. Zhao
M. Sun
E. Chang
dcterms:description: Wiki is a webpage network where nodes denote webpages and are connected if linked by another. The node attribute is described by TF-IDF weighted vectors.
dcterms:title: Wiki

dcterms:creator: S. Fan
X. Wang
C. Shi
E. Lu
K. Lin
B. Wang
dcterms:description: ACM is a paper network where nodes denote papers and they are connected if they are written by the same author. The node attribute is described by a bag of words of keywords.
dcterms:title: ACM
